description: first step to introducing you to all the most important elements of your program

name: Schedule Your New Student Check-In Phone Call
description: It is required that you attend a Welcome Webinar before you schedule this call

name: Review all information on your student success center
description: Please bookmark your Student Success Center. Your Student Success Center is the best resource for all information specific to your program. Please expect to refer to this website for updated information each semester. It contains information on textbooks, payment options/refund policies, registration information, academic calendars, and FAQs.

name: Get Started on Your New Student Orientation Course - Due May 2nd!
description: You have been registered for and will have access to your New Student Orientation in the next 4-8 hours. The orientation is mandatory and must be completed by Friday, May 2, 2025. Many students tell me they spend anywhere from 16-20 hours working through their orientation, so please set ample time aside to complete all the modules! You can refer to the Orientation Guide for step-by-step instructions.
